;http://su-speaker.com; , ;http://www.su-speaker.com; The world first patent mini speaker——Speakers can charging for mobile phone,iPad, iPhone, MP3, MP4, mobile fn-38
;
;Along with the rapid development of science and technology, the high-tech digital products has been popular to everyone, and especially the ones that is easy to carry. For example: ipad, iphone, MP3, MP4, MP5, etc. But they have a common characteristic: all are with built-in lithium battery. And the lithium battery can be on work for only a few or dozens of hours after charging.
;We also become puzzled when enjoying the high-tech, it is suddenly out of power, all the work and entertainment can't continue. Today, Shenzhen Zena Electronics Co., Ltd. (;www.su-speaker.com;) develops a worldwide patent product charging for mobile digital products anywhere and anytime
;First, mobile products generally have a USB charging line and can charge through the line.
;Second, most mobile digital product can make a sound, but effect is poor, it is completely not satisfying the demand of the digital players .
;According to the above points, Shenzhen Zena Electronic Co., Ltd. (;www.su-speaker.com;) developes a mobile, portable speaker which can charge for ipod, iphone, mobile phones, MP3, MP4. The volume of the speaker is small, so it is convenient to take and the sound quality is pefect, and it have a USB interface which can charge for a variety of digital products, and the lithium battery is the Nokia cell phone battery sold all over the world. The battery can come down and be charged by other charging equipment, then the sound box itself is with a USB charging line, this would solve the digital products died suddenly.
